DOC.detailed_description: Obesity pregnancy increase risk high glucose diabetes mother , obesity comorbid metabolic disease offspring . Results previous intervention study design improve metabolic health obese mother , thereby reduce risk offspring , modest best . Furthermore , study prove efficacious among low income African American woman high risk transmission obesity future generation . The purpose study examine feasibility change type food drink consume night late pregnancy order improve maternal glucose tolerance reduce risk future obesity child . We hypothesize woman replace usual night-time food drink low glycemic load option stable night-time glucose lower glucose follow oral glucose load . This intervention assess cohort African American woman low income , obese first prenatal care visit .
